elements.description: Get information about proxies for a specific url.
elements.name: networkinfo.get_proxy_info

parameters.doc: The url to get proxy configurations for
parameters.name: url

returnvalues.doc:
A list of proxies to try in order. Each proxy has three values
  type: direct (no proxy), http, socks
  host: proxy url
  port: proxy port number
returnvalues.name: table

info.description: Functions to get information about the network configuration of the device.
info.name: extension-network-info
